PhotovoltaicSystemTabContent.title: Photovoltaic Systems

PhotovoltaicSystemTabContent.autoCalculatedCost: Automatically calculated from the sum of installation costs
PhotovoltaicSystemTabContent.autoCalculatedValueAfterUnexpected: Sum of total cost and unexpected expenses
PhotovoltaicSystemTabContent.autoCalculatedTax: Calculated as 24% of value after unexpected expenses
PhotovoltaicSystemTabContent.autoCalculatedTotalProject: Sum of value after unexpected and tax

PhotovoltaicSystemTabContent.autoCalculatedAnnualSavings: Calculated based on annual energy production and energy cost
PhotovoltaicSystemTabContent.autoCalculatedIRR: Calculated using Newton-Raphson method (rate where NPV = 0)
PhotovoltaicSystemTabContent.autoCalculatedNPV: Calculated using discount rate for 25 years
PhotovoltaicSystemTabContent.annualOperationalCostsHelp: Maintenance and operational costs per year (used for IRR calculation)
PhotovoltaicSystemTabContent.autoCalculatedEnergyProduction: Calculated based on power per panel, quantity, efficiency and installation angle
PhotovoltaicSystemTabContent.autoCalculatedCarbonReduction: Calculated based on annual energy production and CO2 factor
